title: How many people might ever exist, calculated

media:group.media:title: How many people might ever exist, calculated
media:group.media:description:
You can get 50% off What We Owe The Future and drive sales to local independent bookstores by using the promotion code PRIMER50 when buying from the following website: https://bookshop.org/books/what-we-owe-the-future/9781541618626

I made this video in partnership with the Forethought Foundation for Global Priorities Research, where the author Will MacAskill serves as director. Their goal is to help the book reach more people, and I’m very aligned with that goal. The more we can work together to think about our future, the better!

Source links:
https://ourworldindata.org/longtermism

https://ourworldindata.org/world-population-update-2022
